channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen
channel.description:
Queen (Unique)
[Original King's Alignment] Special
Passive: Unknown Ruler: If you are an Unseen or Cult Queen, you can't talk with them or know who they are. They also don't know who you are. Players don't know who the Queen is.
Passive: Secret Meetup: You and the King can talk to each other at night but the King can't send guards to you.
Day Ability: Persuade and Clean: Make someone vote for someone else but they won't know. 3 Uses.
Night Ability: The Regal Path: Favor a player. If they ever become the King, their alignment will be the same as yours. 2 Uses.
Night Ability: Storytelling: Tell a player the Current King's alignment. 3 Uses.
Goal: If BD/Unseen/Cult: The BD/Unseen/Cult wins. If Neutral: The current king at the end of the game is Neutral.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen
item.dc:creator: cupcakeaj2
item.description:
Fine.

Ignore Storytelling then

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I don’t like story telling.

There is supposed to be no way to tell the original king’s alignment.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen
item.dc:creator: cupcakeaj2
item.description:
Queen (Unique)

[Original King’s Alignment] Special

Passive: Unknown Ruler: If you are an Unseen or Cult Queen, you can’t talk with them or know who they are. They also don’t know who you are. Players don’t know who the Queen is.

Passive: Secret Meetup: You and the King can talk to each other at night but the King can’t send guards to you.

Day Ability: Persuade and Clean: Make someone vote for someone else but they won’t know. 3 Uses.

Night Ability: The Regal Path: Favor a player. If they ever become the King, their alignment will be the same as yours. 2 Uses.

Night Ability: Storytelling: Tell a player the Current King’s alignment. 3 Uses.

Goal: If BD/Unseen/Cult: The BD/Unseen/Cult wins. If Neutral: The current king at the end of the game is Neutral.
